TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UserControl extends System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl

summary.span: 提供一个可用来创建其他控件的空控件。

span.span: Provides an empty control that can be used to create other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过扩展 ， 继承用户控件中所需的所有标准定位和助记处理代码。By extending , inherits all the standard positioning and mnemonic-handling code that is necessary in a user control. 使您能够创建可在应用程序或组织中的多个位置使用的控件。The gives you the ability to create controls that can be used in multiple places within an application or organization. 您可以包括验证请求用户输入的常见数据所需的所有代码;其中的一些示例包括电子邮件地址 (参阅示例部分) 、电话号码和邮政编码。You can include all the code needed for validation of common data you ask the user to input; some examples of this are email addresses (see Example section), telephone numbers, and postal codes. 用户控件的另一种有效使用方式是只需预加载一个 ，或使用通常在几乎所有应用程序中使用的静态项; 其中的一些示例是国家/地区、城市、州和办公室位置。Another efficient use of the user control is to simply preload a or with static items you commonly use in almost every application; some examples of this are countries/regions, cities, states, and office locations. 有关创作自定义控件的详细信息，请参阅 [用 .NET Framework 开发自定义 Windows 窗体控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls)。For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls). > [!NOTE] > 可以考虑创建包含多个用户控件类的命名空间，并将其编译到一个 DLL 中。You might consider creating a namespace that contains several classes of user controls and compiling it into one DLL. 此 DLL 可与应用程序或组织中的所有应用程序一起引用和分发。This DLL can be referenced and distributed with the application or all applications within an organization. 这使你能够在多个应用程序中引用用户控件，并节省时间并为用户控件的所包含元素编写代码。This gives you the ability to reference the user control in many applications and save time laying out and coding the contained elements of the user control. 用户控件还能在应用程序内部或跨应用程序进行一致性;例如，所有地址信息输入块都具有相同的外观和行为。A user control also gives you consistency within or across applications; for example, all address information input blocks will all have the same appearance and behavior. 一致性可为应用程序提供更精美和更专业的外观。Consistency gives your application a more polished and professional appearance. > > 可以 在窗体中的其他窗体、其他、网页 上的 Internet Explorer 内或 窗体上承载的控件内承载 Windows 窗体派生类。You can host Windows Forms derived classes inside of a form, on another , inside of Internet Explorer on a Web page, or inside a control hosted on a form. > [!NOTE] > 在 控件内部承载时 ，不能使用标记值关闭视觉样式 `META` `MSThemeCompatible` 。When hosting a inside of the control, you cannot turn off Visual Styles using the `META` tag value `MSThemeCompatible`. 有关视觉样式的详细信息，请参阅 [用视觉样式呈现控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles)。For more information about Visual Styles, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles). 请注意，对于 Smartphone 应用程序，此控件需要适用于智能手机的 Windows Mobile 版本5.0 软件。Note that for Smartphone applications, this control requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 ，它可以在多个应用程序中重复使用以获取用户信息。The following code example creates a that can be reused in multiple applications to get user information. 此示例将多个 控件、 控件和添加 到 以收集用户的信息。This example adds several controls, controls and an to the to gather the user's information. 此外，用户的电子邮件地址会在发生时进行验证， 如果数据验证失败，则使用对象来向用户提供反馈。Additionally, the user's email address is validated in the event of the and the object is used to give the user feedback if the data fails validation. 此代码旨在编译为 DLL，以便在其他应用程序中引用。The code is intended to be compiled into a DLL for reference in other applications. [!code-cpp[Classic UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不会创建的实例 。You do not typically create an instance of . 若要创建自己的用户控件类，请从 类继承。To create your own user control class, inherit from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建派生类的实例，该实例 `MyCustomerInfoUserControl` 是在类概述的 "示例" 部分中创建的 。The following code example creates an instance of the derived class, `MyCustomerInfoUserControl`, which was created in the example section of the class overview. 用户控件将添加到 控件，并 将其属性设置为 。The user control is added to a control and has its property set to . 然后，将 添加到 。The is then added to a . [!code-cpp[Classic UserControl.UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl.UserControl Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UserControl.UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl.UserControl Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UserControl.UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl.UserControl Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件将如何调整其自身大小。

span.span: Gets or sets how the control will resize itself.
A value from the enumeration.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不识别属性的控件的 功能将与 设置为的一样 。Controls that do not recognize the property will function as though was set to . 默认情况下，识别属性的所有控件 都将增大以适合可用空间，但不会缩小到属性指定的值之下 。All controls that recognize the property will, by default, grow to fit available space, but will not shrink below the value specified by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AutoValidateChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果自定义控件执行其自身的任何验证，则需要知道何时使用控件的开发人员更改了 属性，以便您可以相应地更改控件的验证行为。If your custom control performs any of its own validation, you will need to know when a developer using your control has changed the property so that you can change your control's validation behavior accordingly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `UserControl1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `UserControl1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#641](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#641)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#641](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#641)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 ，控件具有凹陷三维外观。When the property is set to , the control has a sunken, three-dimensional appearance. 若要显示平面、细边框，请将 属性设置为 。To display a flat, thin border, set the property to .

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Load As EventHandler

summary.span: 在控件第一次变为可见之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the control becomes visible for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此事件来执行任务，例如分配控件所使用的资源。You can use this event to perform tasks such as allocating resources used by the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果 是 MDI 子窗体的一部分，则 每次显示子窗体时都会发生该事件。If the is part of an MDI child form, the event will occur each time the child form is shown. 在这种情况下，应将任何一次性初始化代码放在中， 而不是 事件处理程序中。In this case, you should put any one-time initialization code in the instead of a event handler. > [!CAUTION] > 创建的句柄时发生此事件 。The event occurs when the handle for the is created. 在某些情况下，这可能会导致 事件发生多次。In some circumstances, this can cause the event to occur more than one time. 例如，如果在 加载时发生事件 ，则在重新创建该句柄时发生。For example, the event occurs when the is loaded, and again if the handle is recreated. (通过调用方法来重新创建句柄的一种方法 。 ) ，以使 事件发生多次，应将任何一次性初始化代码放在 构造函数中，而不是 事件处理程序中。(One way that a handle is recreated is by calling the method.) To account for the event occurring more than one time, you should put any one time initialization code in the constructor instead of a event handler. 此外，不应将数据绑定添加到 事件处理程序中的。In addition, you should not add data bindings to the in a event handler. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `UserControl1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `UserControl1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#642](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#642)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#642](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#642)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnCreateControl() cil managed

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 事件在控件创建之后但在控件第一次变为可见之前发生。The event occurs after the control is created, but before the control becomes visible for the first time. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
